content.text: Just relaxing at home. I have a long drive to work so I'm looking forward to a relaxing weekend at home with my dog, playing games and watching movies.
That sounds nice. I'm not that big into gaming but I love watching movies and shows. I'm currently watching Game of Thrones even though my parents don't approve of it.
Oh, I love Game of Thrones! I'm a little behind on the latest season but I can't wait to catch up. I'm not close to my family because of what happened when I was a child.
I'm sorry to hear that. My family is very supportive of my musical dreams, and we often go to the opera together. I'm not very good at playing basketball but I love watching it.
That's awesome that your family is supportive of your musical dreams. I love listening to music but I'm not very good at playing any instruments. What's your favorite music?
My favorite music is techno. It helps me get in the zone for my workouts. I also love eating tuna fish salad at least every day. It's my favorite food.
I've never been a fan of tuna fish salad but I can definitely see why you like it. It's healthy and it's easy to make. I'm looking forward to a sweet treat as a reward after my long drive to work.
